Yes, it only requires Postal 2: STP. AW isn't necessary.

where do i find help on this? this game crashes right after the subway stops and you go into the bathroom where to mirror breaks. shuts down everytime. this game is so great. scares the shit out of me. better that the original.
ok all. heres the scoop. the bathroom at the end of the subway is glitched. stay out. go to the control room with the guards key and keep killing zombies.
i forgot one thing. thanks bio and tell your friends thanks also. i hope this new wave of game making catches on.
